snippet: A new show of the artist Darren Bader’s work includes a 15-by-15-foot board where pawns and rooks are replaced by shoes, flowers, microphones — and people.
abstract: Artist Darren Bader's exhibition at Sadie Coles HQ gallery includes 15-by-15 ft ceramic chess board, where volunteers can play five different creative variations of game.
lead_paragraph: A new show of the artist Darren Bader’s work includes a 15-by-15-foot board where pawns and rooks are replaced by shoes, flowers, microphones — and people.

headline.main: At One London Gallery, Chess Is Larger Than Life
headline.print_headline: On View; Chess, Larger Than Life
